blogs.title: Naruto Uzumaki
blogs.body: Guided by the spirit demon within him, Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.
blogs.author: Masashi Kishimoto

blogs.title: Death Note
blogs.body: The story follows Light Yagami, a teen genius who discovers a mysterious notebook: the Death NOte.
blogs.author: Tsugumi Ohba

blogs.title: Tokyo Ghoul
blogs.body: Tokyo Ghoul is a Japanese dark fantasy manga series written and illustrated by Sui Ishida. It was serialized in Shueisha's seinen manga magazine Weekly Young Jump between September 2011 and September 2014, and was collected in fourteen tank≈çbon volumes.

blogs.title: lolo
blogs.body:
Shonen. When you think of anime, what comes to mind is likely shonen. ...
Shoujo. Sailor Moon, Cardcaptor Sakura, Fruits Basket, Nana: They might range far and wide in terms of story, but all of these series are shoujo. ...
